s.text: Which was only fair, because he seemed to be salivating less over America's new golden girls than over his giant tub of fried something or other--popcorn?

There are also hair and eyebrow charts and a sketch of a face upon which you draw birthmarks, moles, and freckles.
There are, however, only six choices on the skin tone chart, from "porcelain," to a suspiciously light "dark brown."
There are 26 pictures of eyeballs in assorted colors; circle the one closest to your child's.
